name: Towers & Goblins
description:
Ever wanted to relax and just shoot at something?

Towers & Goblins is a casual, single-player game where you take
control of 4 towers that are being sieged by Goblins and Golems. With a
limited amount of upgrades and ammo, choose wisely which Tower should
get a bonus.

Buckle up and see how long can you last against countless waves of enemies!

(Game includes video ads)

Full credits come with the game
